How to find multibagger stocks:

(Bookmark🎟️)

• Revenues is at all time high
• EBITDA is at all time high
• Net Profit is at all time high
• Promoters pledging is 0%
• Debt to equity is less than 1
• Stock price is in 20% range of all time high
